title: Installation issue: adios2%gcc on macOS
body:
Hi,

The package maintainers are:
@ax3l 
@chuckatkins 
@williamfgc

Sorry for bothering you all with this.

But I am stuck with this issue (description below), when trying to install `adios2` with `cmake-3.18.2`, `gcc-10.2.0` and `mpich-3.3.2`.

I don't remember if this was already solved.

Using `spack edit adios2` so looking into the `packages` file I can see that the `FFLAGS` include `fallow-argument-mistmatch`.
But I can't tell how to try the many solutions mentioned on the internet (over many years) for this.

And I am very sorry if I missed the fix in other posts here (but I can't seem to find them now) and for any possible mistake I am doing in this installation.

I will try to workaround this by using `openmpi`.

And will let you know if it works with it asap.

Cheers,
Diana


```console
spack install adios2%gcc
```
